snippet: Important new rules, plus health care reform, will provide parity in mental health treatment.
abstract: Editorial welcomes new rules issued by Obama administration that will finally force insurers to cover mental health and addiction services on same basis as medical and surgical costs; holds that rules will need to be vigorously enforced in order to be effective.
